docs.snippet: LONDON, Feb. 23--For the first time since the outbreak of this paradeless war of little glamour the people of London today had a chance to see and cheer victors in battle.

headline.main: SHIPPING AND MAILS; Outgoing Passenger and Mail Ships

docs.snippet: Not a great deal of business and by the same token little in the way of important fluctuations was registered in the foreign exchange market last week. Factually, the market was cut to the same pattern which has characterized trading in the new...
docs.lead_paragraph: Not a great deal of business and by the same token little in the way of important fluctuations was registered in the foreign exchange market last week. Factually, the market was cut to the same pattern which has characterized trading in the new year--light dealings and moderate steadiness in values.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Feb. 26--Further strain was added to the already tense political situation today when the Chamber of Deputies refused to take up consideration of President Alfredo Baldomir's challenge that the Constitution must be reformed.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Feb. 26--Further strain was added to the already tense political situation today when the Chamber of Deputies refused to take up consideration of President Alfredo Baldomir's challenge that the Constitution must be reformed.
docs.abstract: Cong shuns call to reform Const

headline.main: URUGUAYAN CHAMBER IRKED BY BALDOMIR; But It Shuns President's Call to Reform Constitution

byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: Ending rumors prevalent since war broke out in Europe that there would be a disastrous "blackout" in the international area of the 1940 New York World's Fair, the Fair Corporation issued yesterday an official "factual review," disclosing that the...
docs.lead_paragraph: Ending rumors prevalent since war broke out in Europe that there would be a disastrous "blackout" in the international area of the 1940 New York World's Fair, the Fair Corporation issued yesterday an official "factual review," disclosing that the impressive array of foreign exhibits adjoining the Court of Peace would be virtually intact.
